message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.DB 

This paper is about personalized recommendation techniques, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of topic models, which is a subfield of natural language processing (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper applies the proposed Joint Factorizational Topic (JFT) model to restaurant recommendation, which involves data management and database systems (cs.DB) and potentially social networks (cs.SI) if the recommendations are influenced by social connections.
